channel.title: Compiling errors can't be avoided
channel.description:
Hey Mopar,
I wanted to use [url=http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/google/tutorials/341356-unique-starter-interface-pi-renamed.html]this[/url] for my server.
Everything went right, untill the client-sided part. In my client folder I have 2 RSInterface.java 's. One in the original folder, and one in the 'blah' folder inside the original folder. They are pretty much the same, but the original folder one is some bigger.
At the 'blah' one, everything went fine. The only thing was I couldn't find 'aClass44 = streamLoader;', but I added it somewhere together with Starter(textDrawingAreas); , which I had to add under it.
Now the only problem is I have to do both RSInterface.java 's , because with only 1 it doesn't work. But when I try adding the things I added in the blah one, it gives 100 compile errors, which usually means I'm missing a bracket, but I'm doing it exactly the same was as with the blah one... I can't find what I've done wrong.
Here are both RSInterface.java's :
THE 'BLAH' ONE (which works fine)
[url=http://pastebin.com/7XrZBLQ2]RSInterface.java BLAH - Pastebin.com[/url]
AND the original folder one.
[url=http://pastebin.com/h7asD7Z0]RSInterface.java ORIGINAL - Pastebin.com[/url]
And last but not least, my compile errors when I put this:
[code]aClass44 = streamLoader; Starter(textDrawingAreas); }[/code]
which I already have in the blah one, in the original one.
[code] RSInterface.java:338: error: class, interface, or enum expected drawTooltip(31261, "Bookcase (lvl 29):
15x Nails, 3x Oa k plank"); ^ RSInterface.java:340: error: class, interface, or enum expected addButtons(31263, 4, "Interfaces/Construction/CONS", "Bu ild @or1@Greenman's ale", 31264, 1); ^ RSInterface.java:341: error: class, interface, or enum expected drawTooltip(31264, "Greenamn's ale (lvl 26):
15x Nails, 2x Oak plank"); ^ RSInterface.java:343: error: class, interface, or enum expected addButtons(31266, 5, "Interfaces/Construction/CONS", "Bu ild @or1@Small oven", 31267, 1); ^ RSInterface.java:344: error: class, interface, or enum expected drawTooltip(31267, "Small oven (lvl 24):
2x Iron bar");
^ RSInterface.java:346: error: class, interface, or enum expected addButtons(31269, 6, "Interfaces/Construction/CONS", "Bu ild @or1@Carved oak bench", 31270, 1); ^ RSInterface.java:347: error: class, interface, or enum expected drawTooltip(31270, "Carved oak bench (lvl 31):
15x Nail s, 3x Oak plank"); ^ RSInterface.java:349: error: class, interface, or enum expected addButtons(31272, 7, "Interfaces/Construction/CONS", "Bu ild @or1@Painting stand", 31273, 1); ^ RSInterface.java:350: error: class, interface, or enum expected drawTooltip(31273, "Painting stand (lvl 41):
20x Nails, 2x Oak plank"); ^ RSInterface.java:352: error: class, interface, or enum expected addButtons(31275, 8, "Interfaces/Construction/CONS", "Bu ild @or1@Bed", 31276, 1); ^ RSInterface.java:353: error: class, interface, or enum expected drawTooltip(31276, "Bed (lvl 40):
20x Nails, 3x Oak pla nk"); ^ RSInterface.java:355: error: class, interface, or enum expected addButtons(31278, 9, "Interfaces/Construction/CONS", "Bu ild @or1@Teak drawers", 31279, 1); ^ RSInterface.java:356: error: class, interface, or enum expected drawTooltip(31279, "Teak drawers (lvl 51):
20x Nails, 2 x Teak plank"); ^ RSInterface.java:358: error: class, interface, or enum expected addButtons(31281, 10, "Interfaces/Construction/CONS", "B uild @or1@Mithril armour", 31282, 1); ^ RSInterface.java:359: error: class, interface, or enum expected drawTooltip(31282, "Mithril armour (lvl 28):
1x Mithril full helm, platebody, platelegs"); ^ RSInterface.java:361: error: class, interface, or enum expected addButtons(31284, 11, "Interfaces/Construction/CONS", "B uild @or1@Adamant armour", 31285, 1); ^ RSInterface.java:362: error: class, interface, or enum expected drawTooltip(31285, "Adamant armour (lvl 28):
1x Adamant full helm, platebody, platelegs"); ^ RSInterface.java:364: error: class, interface, or enum expected addButtons(31287, 12, "Interfaces/Construction/CONS", "B uild @or1@Rune armour", 31288, 1); ^ RSInterface.java:365: error: class, interface, or enum expected drawTooltip(31288, "Rune armour (lvl 28):
1x Rune full helm, platebody, platelegs"); ^ RSInterface.java:367: error: class, interface, or enum expected addButtons(31290, 13, "Interfaces/Construction/CONS", "B uild @or1@Rune display case", 31291, 1); ^ RSInterface.java:368: error: class, interface, or enum expected drawTooltip(31291, "Rune display case (lvl 41):
100x La w rune, 100x Nature rune, 1x Teak plank"); ^ RSInterface.java:370: error: class, interface, or enum expected addButtons(31293, 14, "Interfaces/Construction/CONS", "B uild @or1@Archery target", 31294, 1); ^ RSInterface.java:371: error: class, interface, or enum expected drawTooltip(31294, "Archery target (lvl 81):
25x Nails, 3x Teak plank"); ^ RSInterface.java:373: error: class, interface, or enum expected addButtons(31296, 15, "Interfaces/Construction/CONS", "B uild @or1@Combat stone", 31297, 1); ^ RSInterface.java:374: error: class, interface, or enum expected drawTooltip(31297, "Combat stone (lvl 59):
4x Iron bar" ); ^ RSInterface.java:376: error: class, interface, or enum expected addButtons(31299, 16, "Interfaces/Construction/CONS", "B uild @or1@Elemental balance", 31300, 1); ^ RSInterface.java:377: error: class, interface, or enum expected drawTooltip(31300, "Elemental balance (lvl 77):
4x Iron bar"); ^ RSInterface.java:379: error: class, interface, or enum expected addButtons(31302, 17, "Interfaces/Construction/CONS", "B uild @or1@Mahogany prize chest", 31303, 1); ^ RSInterface.java:380: error: class, interface, or enum expected drawTooltip(31303, "Mahogany prize chest (lvl 54):
20x Nails, 2x Mahogany plank"); ^ RSInterface.java:382: error: class, interface, or enum expected addButtons(31305, 18, "Interfaces/Construction/CONS", "B uild @or1@Lectern", 31306, 1); ^ RSInterface.java:383: error: class, interface, or enum expected drawTooltip(31306, "Lectern (lvl 67):
40x Nails, 2x Mah ogany plank"); ^ RSInterface.java:385: error: class, interface, or enum expected addButtons(31308, 19, "Interfaces/Construction/CONS", "B uild @or1@Crystal of power", 31309, 1); ^ RSInterface.java:386: error: class, interface, or enum expected drawTooltip(31309, "Crystal of power (lvl 66):
15x Nail s, 2x Mahogany plank, 1x Iron bar"); ^ RSInterface.java:388: error: class, interface, or enum expected addButtons(31311, 20, "Interfaces/Construction/CONS", "B uild @or1@Altar", 31312, 1); ^ RSInterface.java:389: error: class, interface, or enum expected drawTooltip(31312, "Altar (lvl 64):
15x Nails, 2x Mahog any plank, 1x Iron bar"); ^ RSInterface.java:391: error: class, interface, or enum expected addButtons(31314, 21, "Interfaces/Construction/CONS", "B uild @or1@Intense burners", 31315, 1); ^ RSInterface.java:392: error: class, interface, or enum expected drawTooltip(31315, "Intense burners (lvl 61):
10x Nails , 2x Mahogany plank, 1x Kwuarm"); ^ RSInterface.java:394: error: class, interface, or enum expected addButtons(31317, 22, "Interfaces/Construction/CONS", "B uild @or1@Hedge", 31318, 1); ^ RSInterface.java:395: error: class, interface, or enum expected drawTooltip(31318, "Hedge (lvl 80):
2x Logs, 2x Kwuarm" ); ^ RSInterface.java:397: error: class, interface, or enum expected addButtons(31320, 23, "Interfaces/Construction/CONS", "B uild @or1@Rocnar", 31321, 1); ^ RSInterface.java:398: error: class, interface, or enum expected drawTooltip(31321, "Rocnar (lvl 83):
2x Adamant bar, 2x Kwuarm"); ^ RSInterface.java:400: error: class, interface, or enum expected addButtons(31323, 24, "Interfaces/Construction/CONS", "B uild @or1@Bank chest", 31324, 1); ^ RSInterface.java:401: error: class, interface, or enum expected drawTooltip(31324, "Bank chest (lvl 92):
40x Nails, 2x Mahogany plank, 1x Iron bar"); ^ RSInterface.java:404: error: class, interface, or enum expected setBounds(29561, 413, 9, 1, Interface);//CLOSE ^ RSInterface.java:405: error: class, interface, or enum expected setBounds(29562, 413, 9, 2, Interface);//CLOSE HOVER ^ RSInterface.java:406: error: class, interface, or enum expected setBounds(31249, 69, 3, 0, Interface);//BACKOGRUND X Y ^ RSInterface.java:408: error: class, interface, or enum expected setBounds(31251, 109, 28, 3, Interface);//Build item ^ RSInterface.java:409: error: class, interface, or enum expected setBounds(31252, 76, 285, 4, Interface);//Requirements ^ RSInterface.java:411: error: class, interface, or enum expected setBounds(31254, 172, 28, 5, Interface);//Build item ^ RSInterface.java:412: error: class, interface, or enum expected setBounds(31255, 76, 285, 6, Interface);//Requirements ^ RSInterface.java:414: error: class, interface, or enum expected setBounds(31257, 236, 28, 7, Interface);//Build item ^ RSInterface.java:415: error: class, interface, or enum expected setBounds(31258, 76, 285, 8, Interface);//Requirements ^ RSInterface.java:417: error: class, interface, or enum expected setBounds(31260, 300, 28, 9, Interface);//Build item ^ RSInterface.java:418: error: class, interface, or enum expected setBounds(31261, 76, 285, 10, Interface);//Requirements ^ RSInterface.java:420: error: class, interface, or enum expected setBounds(31263, 364, 28, 11, Interface);//Build item ^ RSInterface.java:421: error: class, interface, or enum expected setBounds(31264, 76, 285, 12, Interface);//Requirements ^ RSInterface.java:424: error: class, interface, or enum expected setBounds(31266, 109, 76, 13, Interface);//Build item ^ RSInterface.java:425: error: class, interface, or enum expected setBounds(31267, 76, 285, 14, Interface);//Requirements ^ RSInterface.java:427: error: class, interface, or enum expected setBounds(31269, 172, 76, 15, Interface);//Build item ^ RSInterface.java:428: error: class, interface, or enum expected setBounds(31270, 76, 285, 16, Interface);//Requirements ^ RSInterface.java:430: error: class, interface, or enum expected setBounds(31272, 236, 76, 17, Interface);//Build item ^ RSInterface.java:431: error: class, interface, or enum expected setBounds(31273, 76, 285, 18, Interface);//Requirements ^ RSInterface.java:433: error: class, interface, or enum expected setBounds(31275, 300, 76, 19, Interface);//Build item ^ RSInterface.java:434: error: class, interface, or enum expected setBounds(31276, 76, 285, 20, Interface);//Requirements ^ RSInterface.java:436: error: class, interface, or enum expected setBounds(31278, 364, 76, 21, Interface);//Build item ^ RSInterface.java:437: error: class, interface, or enum expected setBounds(31279, 76, 285, 22, Interface);//Requirements ^ RSInterface.java:440: error: class, interface, or enum expected setBounds(31281, 109, 124, 23, Interface);//Build item ^ RSInterface.java:441: error: class, interface, or enum expected setBounds(31282, 76, 285, 24, Interface);//Requirements ^ RSInterface.java:443: error: class, interface, or enum expected setBounds(31284, 172, 124, 25, Interface);//Build item ^ RSInterface.java:444: error: class, interface, or enum expected setBounds(31285, 76, 285, 26, Interface);//Requirements ^ RSInterface.java:446: error: class, interface, or enum expected setBounds(31287, 236, 124, 27, Interface);//Build item ^ RSInterface.java:447: error: class, interface, or enum expected setBounds(31288, 76, 285, 28, Interface);//Requirements ^ RSInterface.java:449: error: class, interface, or enum expected setBounds(31290, 300, 124, 29, Interface);//Build item ^ RSInterface.java:450: error: class, interface, or enum expected setBounds(31291, 76, 285, 30, Interface);//Requirements ^ RSInterface.java:452: error: class, interface, or enum expected setBounds(31293, 364, 124, 31, Interface);//Build item ^ RSInterface.java:453: error: class, interface, or enum expected setBounds(31294, 76, 285, 32, Interface);//Requirements ^ RSInterface.java:456: error: class, interface, or enum expected setBounds(31296, 109, 172, 33, Interface);//Build item ^ RSInterface.java:457: error: class, interface, or enum expected setBounds(31297, 76, 285, 34, Interface);//Requirements ^ RSInterface.java:459: error: class, interface, or enum expected setBounds(31299, 172, 172, 35, Interface);//Build item ^ RSInterface.java:460: error: class, interface, or enum expected setBounds(31300, 76, 285, 36, Interface);//Requirements ^ RSInterface.java:462: error: class, interface, or enum expected setBounds(31302, 236, 172, 37, Interface);//Build item ^ RSInterface.java:463: error: class, interface, or enum expected setBounds(31303, 76, 285, 38, Interface);//Requirements ^ RSInterface.java:465: error: class, interface, or enum expected setBounds(31305, 300, 172, 39, Interface);//Build item ^ RSInterface.java:466: error: class, interface, or enum expected setBounds(31306, 76, 285, 40, Interface);//Requirements ^ RSInterface.java:468: error: class, interface, or enum expected setBounds(31308, 364, 172, 41, Interface);//Build item ^ 100 errors Press any key to continue. . . [/code]
If anyone could place this
[code]aClass44 = streamLoader; Starter(textDrawingAreas); }[/code]
in the right position in the last, original RSInterface.java, or just help me in any way, that would be great. You'll be forever loved ♥
THANKS IN ADVANCE FOR YOUR TIME YOU WOULD HELP ME A LOT!
Mthijs3

item.title: Compiling errors can't be avoided
item.dc:creator: @Teem_Rocket Teem_Rocket
item.description:
@Teem_Rocket wrote:

The first issue was an extra Bracket.

RSInterface.java:217: error: cannot find symbol
                Starter(textDrawingAreas);
                        ^
  symbol:   variable textDrawingAreas
  location: class RSInterface
RSInterface.java:3874: error: cannot find symbol
        addText(15016, "Choose A Starter", tda, 3, 0xff00FFFB, false, true);
                                           ^
  symbol:   variable tda
  location: class RSInterface
Note: client.java uses unchecked or unsafe operations.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details.
2 errors
Press any key to continue. . .

You need to make sure you’ve declared textDrawingAreas and have the additional code needed to have it function.

Read full topic

item.title: Compiling errors can't be avoided
item.dc:creator: @mthijs3 mthijs3
item.description:
@mthijs3 wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:4, topic:523823”][quote author=mthijs3 link=topic=642371.msg4326496#msg4326496 date=1373005664]
Could you guys please help instead of rick rolling I got rickroll’d too btw
[/quote]You didn’t quote my message… If you would have… everything would have been solved.[/quote]

Pasted the real one, now i got those errors

RSInterface.java:217: error: cannot find symbol Starter(textDrawingAreas); ^ symbol: variable textDrawingAreas location: class RSInterface RSInterface.java:3874: error: cannot find symbol addText(15016, "Choose A Starter", tda, 3, 0xff00FFFB, false, true); ^ symbol: variable tda location: class RSInterface Note: client.java uses unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 2 errors Press any key to continue. . .

THANKS FOR YOUR TIME

Read full topic

item.title: Compiling errors can't be avoided
item.dc:creator: @mthijs3 mthijs3
item.description:
@mthijs3 wrote:

Hey Mopar,

I wanted to use this for my server.

Everything went right, untill the client-sided part. In my client folder I have 2 RSInterface.java 's. One in the original folder, and one in the ‘blah’ folder inside the original folder. They are pretty much the same, but the original folder one is some bigger.

At the ‘blah’ one, everything went fine. The only thing was I couldn’t find ‘aClass44 = streamLoader;’, but I added it somewhere together with Starter(textDrawingAreas); , which I had to add under it.

Now the only problem is I have to do both RSInterface.java 's , because with only 1 it doesn’t work. But when I try adding the things I added in the blah one, it gives 100 compile errors, which usually means I’m missing a bracket, but I’m doing it exactly the same was as with the blah one… I can’t find what I’ve done wrong.

Here are both RSInterface.java’s :

THE ‘BLAH’ ONE (which works fine)

RSInterface.java BLAH - Pastebin.com

AND the original folder one.

RSInterface.java ORIGINAL - Pastebin.com

And last but not least, my compile errors when I put this:

aClass44 = streamLoader; Starter(textDrawingAreas); }

which I already have in the blah one, in the original one.

k plank");
